entries.name: new(a)
entries.desc: Constructs the eigenvalue decomposition for a square matrix A

entries.name: eigenvalue_matrix()
entries.desc: Returns the block diagonal eigenvalue matrix D

entries.name: eigenvalues()
entries.desc: Returns the eigenvalues in an array

entries.name: eigenvector_matrix_inv()
entries.desc: Returns the inverse of the eigenvector matrix V

entries.name: eigenvectors()
entries.desc: Returns an array of the eigenvectors
